channel.title: [PI] Shop problems!
channel.description: Hi im having trouble with my server. i made a shop coast dung dokens and it works, but u can buy any item for 1 token i dont get it but if you have 100 it will buy it too, please help thanks!

item.title: [PI] Shop problems!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

		for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
			TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
			Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995);
			Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(19864);
			Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(5555);
			if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 1 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31 && c.myShopId != 47) {
				c.sendMessage("You don't have enough dung tokens.");
				break;
			}
			if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 1) {
				c.sendMessage("You don't have enough dung tokens.");
				break;
			}
			if(Slot3 == -1 && c.myShopId == 11) {
				c.sendMessage("You don't have enough donator gold.");
				break;
			}









            if(c.myShopId == 1) {
            	if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) {
					if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
						buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
						c.getItems().deleteItem(19864, c.getItems().getItemSlot(19864), 1000);
						c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
						Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
						Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
						if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
						break;
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough dung tokens.");
					break;
				}
